name: The Risers
description: Prepare to fight on a frenzy of blood against 8 selectables fighters. Use the "X-BREAKER" combat system for execute a mortal kickback. Discover all fighters's endings in a classic arcade mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) 1.80 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 or better / Nvidia Geforce Gtx 750 ti or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Intel(R) or better
